overview: Two of the top contenders in the 154-pound division clash as the hard-hitting Erickson “The Hammer” Lubin takes on rising star Sebastian “The Towering Inferno” Fundora in a high-stakes crossroads bout. Lubin has won his last six fights since dropping a world title fight to current champion Jermell Charlo while the nearly six-foot-six Fundora is unbeaten in 19 pro fights. The winner puts himself in prime position to challenge Charlo for the title. Plus, Tony Harrison vs. Sergio Garcia and Kevin Salgado vs. Bryant Perrella. Live on SHOWTIME.
title: Sebastian Fundora vs Erickson Lubin
